about.name: Lucas Dalton
about.blurb: I'm a Software engineer who loves to solve problems, be a great teammate, and continuously learn.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Currently I'm working on Allied's main desktop application to transition it from a monolithic application to a modern cloud native application leveraging AWS. I'm one of two engineers on our Agile team who is responsible for our CI/CD pipeline.  While I work on the fullstack my main focus is on the C# and SQL Server backend.  I've completed integrations on time with internal and external stakeholders across various departments by communicating well and completing non-engineering tasks to ensure the project keeps moving forward.

work.title: System Software Engineer
work.description: I developed and integrated software(C#/C++) to interface with avionics to ensure the timely delivery of flight simulators. Collaborated with other engineering disciplines such as aeronautical, mechanical, electrical, and graphics. In addition, I was engineering lead on several successful, under budget, and on-time projects, including Frasca's first small fixed wing aircraft with full motion. Other responsibilities included traveling, including international, to customers in order to fix and update software.

work.title: Systems Administrator
work.description: At Kirby I deployed, troubleshot, and maintained PCs and servers. I wrote several scripts to aid my day to day routine, and used my coding abilites to enhance our internal employee page.  In addition, maintained Active Directory, programmed telephone and door systems, performed networking tasks, and worked on pretty much anything electronic.  Worked with members of other departments to select, and implement a new time keeping system.  Helped coordinate tearing down, moving, and rebuilding several departments' workspace during a remodel.  Recipient of several thank you cards for exceptional attitude, and helpfulness.

work.title: Teacher's Assistant
work.description: Helped students learn and apply computer programming concepts in Java.
